actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lamia makes two Hooves attacks and one Dagger attack, or it makes three Arcane Bolt attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: _Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 14 (2d10+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Arcane Bolt
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (2d8+3) force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The lamia casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using CHA as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13).
At will: _minor illusion_, _silent image_, _suggestion_
3/day each: _charm_, _command_, _major image_
1/day: _compulsion_

special_abilities.name: Badlands Strider
special_abilities.desc: Difficult terrain composed of sand, mud, or rock doesn't cost the lamia extra movement. In addition, the lamia leaves no tracks or other traces of its passage when moving through sandy, muddy, or rocky terrain.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The lamia is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.
